replies.msg:
The contract for HK signed over 100 years ago was with the Qing Dynasty.

Qing Dynasty is dead and gone now. So in 1997, there was no one to hand over HK to. But the UK still handed over HK to China.

The handover is illegal.

More in this video. Please help to share.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8TG3-RQHQcU
